structure.unit: PHYSICIANS, OSTEOPATHS, PODIATRISTS, AND RELATED MEDICAL PRACTITIONERS

law.catch_line: Definitions for KRS 311.710 to 311.820 and other laws.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 587, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 541, effective July 15, 1998; ch. 578, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1998; and ch. 614, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 342, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 2.
